name: Choice of Life
description:
Choice of Life

Minimalist game about the choice you make in your limited time on Earth.

You have 4 stats: 

  • Social
  • Health
  • Wealth
  • Proficiency

In every playthrough you'll have a limitted time (choices) to make. You have to choose how to spend your time with different activities, which will contribute with positive or negative value to the specified stats. The goal is simple, live a good and balanced life! 

The game is made under 8 hours for LudumDare 43. Theme: Sacrifices must be made!
